problem_summary_simple: Calculate the sum of all numbers formed by root-to-leaf paths in a binary tree.
problem_summary_technical: Traverse a binary tree using DFS, accumulating path values. Return sum of leaf node path values.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by a recursive DFS traversal.
Pass the current number formed by the path down the recursion.
When a leaf node is reached, add the complete number to the total sum.
